tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inspections (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR,
  result VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE non_conformances (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  non_conformance_date DATE,
  description VARCHAR,
  responsible_person VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  department VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  description TEXT
)
